ygData.subject: Creep
ygData.msgSnippet: Pentatron had never been an easy place to live with. This was not a bustling place like Relay, a fortress like Olympus or a haven of prosperity as Atlantis.

Pentatron had never been an easy place to live with. This was not a
bustlin=
g place like Relay, a fortress like Olympus or a haven of
prosperity as Atl=
antis. Pentatron certainly wasn't an easy place for a
nice girl, but it was=
 alright. She had never been a nice girl. She had
never known how to.

She =
had not been caught by the police when she had sucked that young
bot's spar=
k. The rush had allowed her, after some time, to alter her
appearance enoug=
h so to disappear for a while. She had changed back,
but by then, she was r=
oaming the streets, fighting off the urge,
sometimes against her better jud=
gement. The more you resisted, the
worse it would be when she gave in - one=
 way or another.

Creep. That was how the hoboes referred to her. It made h=
er smile with
a clutching sadness. Somehow, she felt it was the right name =
for her. 

She was dragging herself through the city at that point. She was=

getting weaker, which was not a good sign, and she was halfway through
a b=
ig boulevard. Too many people, too many lights, away, away with
you! She wa=
s sleepy, no, please, don't close your eyes! Just... Just
a... little... bi=
t.

She passed out. Energon surge. Nothing serious, technically speaking,
b=
ut people have a way of panigking when things aren't as they should
be. A r=
ing of bots circled her in no time, and later on, an ambulance
picked her u=
p and brought her to a gorvernment medcenter.

OOC: Could someone play tech=
s and wake her up, plz?
